game.name: Thriving City: Song
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In 960 AD, the new Song Dynasty needs you! As magistrate, build a prosperous city from scratch. Develop bustling streets filled with businesses and entertainment, while navigating hidden crises of political strife and foreign invasions. How will you lead through these challenges?
